payload.content: When AI makes rewriting code and understanding large foreign codebases cheap, the incentive to rely on deep dependency trees will collapse, leading to a return of software monoliths.

name: When AI makes rewriting code and understanding large foreign codebases cheap, th
content: When AI makes rewriting code and understanding large foreign codebases cheap, the incentive to rely on deep dependency trees will collapse, leading to a return of software monoliths.

payload.content: Reducing software dependencies offers benefits such as a smaller attack surface for supply chain threats, smaller packaged software, improved performance, and faster boot times.

name: Reducing software dependencies offers benefits such as a smaller attack surface
content: Reducing software dependencies offers benefits such as a smaller attack surface for supply chain threats, smaller packaged software, improved performance, and faster boot times.

payload.content: The Lindy effect, which suggests that long-standing things persist for good reason, will weaken in a world where AI agents can develop software from first principles and understand codebases effortlessly.

name: The Lindy effect, which suggests that long-standing things persist for good reas
content: The Lindy effect, which suggests that long-standing things persist for good reason, will weaken in a world where AI agents can develop software from first principles and understand codebases effortlessly.

payload.content: In an AI-dominated software world, formal verification is essential, not optional, due to the persistence of unknown unknowns.

name: In an AI-dominated software world, formal verification is essential, not optiona
content: In an AI-dominated software world, formal verification is essential, not optional, due to the persistence of unknown unknowns.
